Basic Information.name: Unique ID
Basic Information.help: Global unique ID of this object.

Basic Information.name: Unique Name
Basic Information.help: Global unique Name of this object.

Basic Information.name: Owner ID
Basic Information.help: ID of user who creates this object.

Basic Information.name: Owner Group ID
Basic Information.help: ID of group of user who creates this object.

Basic Information.name: Original Object ID
Basic Information.help: ID of source object of this object, if this object is a copy of an existing object.

Basic Information.name: Child Object IDs
Basic Information.help: ID of all child objects, if this object is a container object.

Basic Information.name: ID
Basic Information.help: Please enter a unique identifier used in your lab.

Basic Information.name: Description
Basic Information.help: Please enter detailes about this protein.

Basic Information.name: Used Plasmid / Vector
Basic Information.help: Please enter the name of the vector / plasmid used for the protein expression. Include links to the respective plasmid/vector database whenever possible.

Basic Information.name: Organism
Basic Information.help: Please enter the organism from which the original cDNA of the isolated protein was obtained.

Basic Information.name: Protein Size and Length
Basic Information.help: Please enter the original and the actual size and length of the isolated protein. Example: mTFP ~27kDa, 711bp, 237aa

Basic Information.name: Modification
Basic Information.help: Please enter modification such as mutations, deletions, insertions. Example: TFPΔ221-240,F555A

Basic Information.name: Reference PubMed ID
Basic Information.help: Please enter the PubMed ID of the paper.

Basic Information.name: Reference Paper
Basic Information.help: Please enter the citation of the paper where the protein was described.

Basic Information.name: Reference DOI
Basic Information.help: Please enter the digital object identifier (doi) of the paper.

Information about Isolation Procedure.name: Expression Protocol
Information about Isolation Procedure.help: Please provide information about the expression system (bacteria/yeast) and the expression procedure by entering a description or placing links to SOPs.

Information about Isolation Procedure.name: Storage of Expression System
Information about Isolation Procedure.help: Please enter the site where the expression system is stored, Example: Room 105, -80°C freezer, Rack A3, Box5, Slot 20

Information about Isolation Procedure.name: Date of Purification
Information about Isolation Procedure.help: Please enter the date of the protein purification.

Information about Isolation Procedure.name: Purification Protocol
Information about Isolation Procedure.help: Please provide information about the purification procedure by entering a description and placing links to SOPs.

Information about Isolation Procedure.name: Concentration of Isolated Protein.
Information about Isolation Procedure.help: Please enter the concentration of the isolated protein and the method used to determine the concentration. Example: Determination of the concentration via UV/Vis absorption E(462nm) = 0.4,d= 1cm (462nm)  = 40000 l/(cm mol) → c = 1 µM

Information about Isolation Procedure.name: Verification of Purity
Information about Isolation Procedure.help: Please enter the method used to verify the identity and purity of the protein. Example: mass spectroscopy, immunoblotting, PAGE

Information about Isolation Procedure.name: Storage
Information about Isolation Procedure.help: Please enter the site where the isolated protein is stored, Example: Aliquots with 20% glycerol, room 105,-80°C freezer, Rack B2, Box3, Slot 18

Origin.name: Origin
Origin.help: Please enter the name of the creator of the protein and/or a link to the webpage.

Origin.name: Origin ID
Origin.help: Please enter the original name or ID of the protein assigned by its creator.

Origin.name: Date of Receive
Origin.help: Please enter the date, when the protein was received.

Additional Information.name: Contact Person
Additional Information.help: Please enter the names and departments of the contact persons or principal investigators who are responsible for this entry and should be contacted for further questions.

Additional Information.name: Aliquots Sent To
Additional Information.help: Please enter when and to whom aliquots have been sent.

Additional Information.name: Notes
Additional Information.help: Please enter and link all further information which is important to the plasmid.
